A specialized piece of furniture designed to securely showcase and store artifacts. Beyond its practical storage function, it serves as a visual centerpiece, allowing stalkers to appreciate the unique and often mesmerizing properties of the artifacts they've collected. %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Displays Artefacts
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]Artefacts are only visible while holding an Artefact Detector
